review: I visited Dr. Vritika after seeing the reviews in practo and I was satisfied after meeting her. She was very friendly and understood my concerns really well before starting the treatment. My post consultation experience was great where she personally messaged me check on me. I would strongly recommend her!
reply_text: Thank you Varsha for your humble words!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Doctor listened to us carefully to understand the exact problem and asked all required questions to narrow down the root cause.

After she understood the possible causes , she explained us that the allergy could because of few reasons and prescribed medication.

She was patient, polite, confident and knowledgeable.

We‚Äôd not yet used the medication completely but we are extremely satisfied with the doctor in this consultation.
reply_text: Hi Mr.Rakesh! Thank you so much :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I had a virtual appointment. It happened on time. Doctor is a good listener, empathetic, all my concerns have been clearly addressed. Not just prescribed medication appropriately but also explained its mechanism of action and the latent period I need to wait for it to become affective. I highly recommend this doctor.
reply_text: Thank you so much Mr. Ravi Kiran :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,
review: ********** ** *** ** *** **** ************** I have been visited for facial hair removal treatment. The services provided here are good, quick and effective. The procedure prescribed are explained very well by the doctor. Dr. Vritika is just amazing at what she does. *** ** *** **** ****** **** *** *******,  I suggest to visit the clinic for any cosmetic and hair solutions.

She is extremely patient, honest and genuine with the right kind of recommendations and treatments. Gives only what is necessary and does consistent follow up checks with her clients to add that extra personal touch to make sure the client has no side effects and is happy with his/her treatment.

Have visited Nava Clinics for a rash on my cheek. I have not only been treated for it but also was given a good daily routine to follow. I have been using their products and I already see a change in my skin texture. I would recommend you‚Äôll to visit Nava for a smooth, glowing and healthy skin

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *** ******* *** ***** * **** ********* *** *** sudden skin rash occurred on Sunday afternoon. She explained the situation thoroughly and patiently. The medication handled my situation efficiently. Most importantly Dr. Vritika was taking my calls on her personal number as when required and clarified on the issues and provided constant feedback

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Firstly, i would like to thank Dr. Vritika for the treatment and the time she has put in for my problem. The reason i went there is for the treatment of a bleb that kept recurring. It took about six sittings *** * *** ****** *** **** * *** *** **** ******** The treatment here is at an affordable price.All i am saying is that i am so thankful to Dr. Vritika for the treatment.
Thank you so much Doc.

review: She is very friendly and patient . She will always  listen to us about our concerns and problems , never go in hurry and the products that was suggested for my skin was really wonderfull and it worked on my skin really good .
